New Records: Dunith Wellalage registered his first half-century in ODIs with an unbeaten 67 (65).
Key Match Events: India and Sri Lanka tied the first ODI of the three-match series.
Rohit Sharma scored a blistering 58 (47) with seven fours and three sixes.
Wanindu Hasaranga and Charith Asalanka picked three wickets each for Sri Lanka.
KL Rahul and Axar Patel stitched a crucial 57-run stand for the sixth wicket.
Shivam Dube fought hard till the end with 25 off 24 balls.
Charith Asalanka dismissed Dube and Arshdeep on back-to-back deliveries to force the game into a tie.
Miscellaneous Highlights: Sri Lanka posted a fighting score of 230/8 in their allotted 50 overs.
India were bundled out for 230 in 47.5 overs.
Dunith Wellalage held the Sri Lankan innings together with crucial partnerships down the order.
